summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 后调用 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用完 方法后，必须释放对 的所有引用，这样垃圾回收器才能收回 占用的内存。After calling the method, you must release all references to the so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the occupied. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用之前，均应调用 方法。Always call the method before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，不会释放正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
